pages.text: Put an empty phial in the top slot or load them in with a hopper.$(br)You can put a potion in the bottom slot OR you can put a bucket of fluid in there.$(br)You can also load the fluid into the storage tank.  You can even pump it in.$(br)You can let it select what to make just by inserting the ingredients or you can hit the recipe select button and make your choice from there.$(br)You can even lock that recipe in.
